snippet: Minnesota officials will check for the presence of zebra mussels and other invaders in boats being hauled along the state's roads.
abstract: Minnesota officials will check for the presence of zebra mussels and other invaders in boats being hauled along the state's roads.
lead_paragraph: For the first time, state officers in Minnesota will conduct random road checks this year for invasive species that could be hitchhiking on trailers, boats and other vehicles. [Duluth News Tribune]

headline.main: On Our Radar: Road Checks for Invasive Species
